testcase.name: Check for the new Ad Format in the Publisher App
testcase.summary: New Adformat at the Publisher level.
testcase.preconditions: Login to Legacy Dashboard as Vungle Admin.

step.actions:
1. Login to DAshboard as Admin
  2. Create New Application
  3. Verify the Pub App details page
step.expectedresults:
1. Logged into Dashboard
  2. Pub App should be created
  3. Pub App should have following Ad Formats
  • Vungle ads
  • Dynamic Templates
  • Exchange
  • All ads
  • 3rd party ads
  • Short-form
  1. Short-from should not be enabled for existing Apps
  2. New Ad format should show for all new Pub Apps

testcase.name: Verify the Placement level New Ad Format setting - Interstitial
testcase.summary: Placement level New Ad Format setting
testcase.preconditions: Publisher App must be created with "Short Form" as Supported Ad Format

step.actions:
1. Login to DAshboard as Admin
  2. Create New Pub Application with "Short Form" Supported Ad Format Type
  3. Verify the the Default Placement Ad Formats
step.expectedresults:
1. Logged into Dashboard
  2. Publisher App must be created
  3. If the Placement Type in Interstitial then  the Placement supported Ad Format are 
  • vungle_local,
  • vungle_mraid,
  • third_party,
  • Short Form

testcase.name: Verify the 'Skippable' checkbox for Rewarded Placements

step.actions:
1. Login to Dashboard
  2. Create a Publisher App and a Placement of type "Rewarded"
  3. Verify the 'Skippable' check box
step.expectedresults: By default for Rewarded Type Placement Skippable is unchecked is  and not editable.

testcase.name: Verify the 'Skippable' checkbox for Interstitial Placements

step.actions:
1. Login to Dashboard
  2. Create a Publisher App and a Placement of type "Interstitial"
  3. Verify the 'Skippable' check box
step.expectedresults: By default for  Interstitial Placement Skippable checkbox must be is Checked and editable by the users

testcase.name: Verify the 'Skippable'checkbox for Native(Flex View) Palcements

step.actions:
1. Login to Dashboard
  2. Create a Publisher App and a Placement of type " Flex View"
  3. Verify the 'Skippable' check box
step.expectedresults: Skippable checkbox should not be available to the native placements

testcase.name: Verify the Creative level New Ad Format setting

step.expectedresults:
Creative modal window must have following options to select from

  • Legacy Creative
  • Dynamic Template Creative
  • Short Form Creative

testcase.name: Verify the Placement level New Ad Format setting - Rewarded
testcase.preconditions: Publisher App must be created with "Short Form" as Supported Ad Format

step.actions:
1. Login to DAshboard as Admin
  2. Create New Pub Application with "Short Form" Supported Ad Format Type
  3. Verify the the Rewarded Placement Ad Formats
step.expectedresults:
1. Logged into Dashboard
  2. Publisher App must be created
  3. If the Placement Type in Interstitial then  the Placement supported Ad Format are 
  • vungle_local,
  • vungle_mraid,
  • third_party,

testcase.name: Verify the Placement level New Ad Format setting - Native
testcase.summary: Placement level New Ad Format setting
testcase.preconditions: Publisher App must be created with "Short Form" as Supported Ad Format

step.actions:
1. Login to DAshboard as Admin
  2. Create New Pub Application with "Short Form" Supported Ad Format Type
  3. Create a  Native (Flex Feed & Flex View) Placement  and verify the Ad Formats
step.expectedresults:
1. Logged into Dashboard
  2. Publisher App must be created
  3. If the Placement Type in Interstitial then  the Placement supported Ad Format are 
  • vungle_mraid,

testcase.name: Verify the 'Skippable'checkbox for Native(Flex Feed) Palcements
testcase.preconditions: Login user must be Admin and placement Type muist be Flex Feed

step.actions:
1. Login to Dashboard
  2. Create a Publisher App and a Placement of type "Flex Feed "
  3. Verify the 'Skippable' check box
step.expectedresults: Skippable checkbox should not be available for the FlexFeed Placement

testcase.name: No Targeting - ShortForm Ads
testcase.summary: Campaign Reward Target type is "All" and Creative should be short-form creative
testcase.preconditions: Campaign  of tyepe "All"should be created and it should linked to Advertiser App and Creative should be "Short Form" Creative

step.actions:
1. Login to Legacy Dashboard
  2. Create a Vungle ads Campaign 
  3. Target the Campaign to "All" for Reward Targeting
  4. Create a ShortForm Creative
step.expectedresults: 1. Pre-SDK5 apps that support ‘All ads’ should show Short Form ads as part of ‘All ads’. Post-SDK5 placements supporting ‘ShortForm’ do too. All other apps do not - ShortForm ads should not show anywhere else as they only show where they’re proactively eligible.

testcase.name: Non-Rewarding Targeting Short-Form Ads
testcase.summary:
Campaign is targeting Non-Rewarding Placement

Creative is a Short-Form Ads
testcase.preconditions:
Short Form Creative must be created

Interstitial Placement must be created

step.actions:
1. Login to Dashboard
  2. Create a Publisher Application with Supported Ad Format type "All ads" "Short Form"
  3. Create a CAmpaign and target it to Non Rewarded Targeting
  4. Create a Short-Form Creative
  5. Verify the results
step.expectedresults: Short Form Ad should be served

testcase.name: Rewarded Targeting Short-Form Ads
testcase.summary: Campaign targeting Rewarded Placement and  Short Form Ads

step.actions:
1. Login to Dashboard
  2. Create a Campaign and target it to Rewarded Placements 
  3. Create short-form Ads
  4. Verify the results
step.expectedresults: Short-form not supported for Rewarded Placements

testcase.name: No Targeting or Rew or Non-Rew Targeting Legacy Ads
testcase.summary:
Campaign not targeting to any placement/or targeting rewarded placement/targeting non rewarded placement

Legacy Ads
testcase.preconditions:
Publisher App must be created with   type "All Ads " or "Legacy Ads"

Placement must be created with supported Ad Format "Legacy"

step.actions:
1. Login to Dashboard
  2. Create a Publisher App with type "All Ads"
  3. Create a Placement of "Legacy" Ad Format and type Rewarded or Interstitial
  4. Create a Campaign  and target to "All" "Rewarded" "Non- Rewarded" 
  5. Create a 0-Video Legacy Creative 
  6. Verify the results
step.expectedresults: Short form ads should play in all Legacy enabled apps, if Ad format is Legacy not Short Form

testcase.name: No Targeting- Dynamic Template Ads
testcase.summary:
Campaign is not  Targeting any palcement

Dynamic Template Ads
testcase.preconditions: Creative should be Dynamic template (Single Page Fullscreen, MultiPage Fullscreen)creative

step.actions:
1. Login to Dashboard
  2. Create a Campaign and target to "All"
  3. Create a Dynamic template Creative
  4. Play the add and verify the results

testcase.name: Non-Rew Targeting Dynamic Template Ads
testcase.summary:
Campaign targeting Interstitial/Native Placements (Non Rewarding),

Dynamic Template Creatives
testcase.preconditions:
Creative should be Dynamic Template Creative and Short form Creatives.

Placement should be Non Rewarded

step.actions:
1. Login to Dashboard
  2. Create a Campaign and target to Non Rewarded Placements
  3. Create Dynamic Template and shortform Creatives
  4. Verify the results
step.expectedresults:
There should not be any changes to DT Ads (single page fullscreen, multi page fullscreen)and DT eligibility

Multi page only if Endcards allowed at placement level.

testcase.name: Rewarded Targeting Dynamic Template Ads
testcase.summary:
Campaign targeting Rewarded Placements-

Dynamic Template Ads
testcase.preconditions: Creative must be Dynamic Template Creative and short form creative

step.actions:
1. Login to Dashboard
  2. Create a Campaign and target it to Rewarded 
  3. Create Dynamic Template and short form creatives
  4. Verify the results
step.expectedresults:
There should not be any changes to DT Ads (single page fullscreen, multi page fullscreen)and DT eligibility

Short Form ads ashould not be served

testcase.name: Native Ads
testcase.summary: Verify the results for Native ads
testcase.preconditions: Placements type must be Flex Feed or Flex View

step.actions:
1. Navigate to Dashboard
  2. Create Campaign with Native Dynamic Template Creatives
  3. Target Campaign to "Non Rewarded" Placements and verify
  4. Target Campaign to "All" and verify results
step.expectedresults: No changes to native campaigns with or without targeting

testcase.name: Verify the results when DT close button settings
testcase.summary: Verify the results when DT close button settings override Placement level settings
testcase.preconditions: " Skippable " must be unchecked at the placement level.

step.actions:
1. Login to Dashboard
  2. Create a Pub App and Placement with "Skippable" checkbox unchecked 
  3. PlayAd
  4. Verify ad played (tap "Close " button on top right to close view)
step.expectedresults: Ad should get closed when user taps on close option.DT close button settings must override Placement level settings.
